value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: What are the main tools for Azure Synapse and SQL???
value.excerpt: Getting started with Azure Synapse Analytics or Azure SQL Database? Or even Microsoft SQL Server in general? Patrick shows you how to use some of the common tools and be able to connect to your instance!  Download SQL Server Management Studio https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/ssms/download-sql-server-management-studio-ssms

value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: What the HECK is a Power BI Gateway Cluster?
value.excerpt: Confused about what a Power BI Gateway cluster is? Have your On-Premises Data Gateway installed but it's overloaded? This video is for you!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-high-availability-clusters  PowerShell: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-powershell-support

value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Adam explores the data protection capabilities within Power BI using security labels and cloud app security.  Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/HyfG-0AHdGs" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Working with images in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how to work with images in Power BI. He isn't talking about adding a logo into your report. This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Advanced Power BI Bookmark Options (Data/Display/Current Page)
value.excerpt: If you use Power BI Bookmarks you may not have used the advanced bookmarking options for  ➔ Bookmark Data ➔ Bookmark Display  ➔ Bookmark Current Page I talk about these options and show you were these can really help you out when using Power BI Bookmarks in advanced scenarios.  ================================

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
